element.name: Demon Knight
element.source: Fester's List of Monsters and Races

description.p: As an Demon Knight, you have the following racial traits.
Creature Type. You are a Fiend.
Ability Score Increase. Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.
Age. Demon knights reach physical prime at about the same age as humans, but can theoretically live indefinitely if supplied with essence from an infernal plane.
Alignment. Demon knights are typically lawful, following the orders of their leaders.
Size. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Powerful Build. You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.
Fire Heart. You are acclimated to extreme heat and suffer no adverse effects from resting in armor.

Essence Recovery. You can draw upon the essence of the infernal planes to quickly heal your body. When completing a short or long rest, you can regain a number of hit dice up to your proficiency bonus. When completing a long rest, you can remove 2 levels of exhaustion.

Battle Senses. When you make a weapon attack that would fail, you can use your reaction to double the proficiency bonus to that weapon attack. Potentially turning a fail into a success. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and either Abyssal or Infernal. Your understanding of Abyssal or Infernal is linked to the fiend clan you are a kin to.
